DOC.brief_summary: A UK prospective , single-centre feasibility study investigate effect exercise therapy functional capacity patient wait list liver transplantation . Patients receive 12-week home prehabilitation program ( daily step program ; functional resistance exercise session ; telephone health call virtual clinic ) . The follow assessed week 0 , 6 12 week : feasibility ( recruitment , compliance , safety , patient perception ) , functional capacity ( ISWT , SPBT ) , psychological wellbeing ( HADS questionnaire ) quality life ( EQ-5D )
